page.description: Displays the Multi-field Quick Filter dialog.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.QUICKSRCHMULTIFLD() method displays the Multi-field Quick Filter dialog.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.view("Customer Information") ? ptr.QuickSrchMultiFld() = 3.000000
